body_html: @AlexisTM The fact there are less Windows based companies explain why they have given higher priority to Linux support(that is pretty obvious) but doesn't explain why according to you I shouldn't ask for official support showing at the company staff my interest in Python 3.6 support, giving a feedback about this matter.

body: @AlexisTM The fact there are less Windows based companies explain why they have given higher priority to Linux support(that is pretty obvious) but doesn't explain why according to you I shouldn't ask for official support showing at the company staff my interest in Python 3.6 support, giving a feedback about this matter.
